# News comment title:
MSNBC Rips Apart Romney: 'Despicable Bigot' 'Racist'

# Oldest comment (from the thread):
Sounds about right.

# Most liked comment (from the thread):
Fact is that the "birther issue" was originally started by Hillary Clinton's supporters during the Democrat primaries in 2008.  So unless the Koch Brothers were Clinton supporters during the primaries your statement has no merit.  And at least Romney didn't eat a dog like Obama himself claims to have done. 

>>> COMMENT UNDER ANALYSIS<<<


 geez can these libs get any more stupid? cant wait to see them go crazy afer obummer gets his a#3 kicked in november.

# News comment title:
Rush Limbaugh: Same-Sex Marriage Issue 'Already Lost'

# Oldest comment (from the thread):
Of course it's lost.


Any country that tolerates a fraudulent President will certainly tolerate gay marriage. 



Besides, Obama ignores rulings from the highest court in the land and will do as he pleases.

# Most liked comment (from the thread):
Rush gives up too soon and easily.  Did he change his name to Rush Boehner?

Failure of the churches speak up against this (and other sins) is the real problem.  Still not too late to turn this around.   Less than 2% of the population self-identifies as homosexual http://bit.ly/JUhrIQ .  So why would we give up so easily on this? Marriage means between one man and one woman - clearly understood without any need to explain for thousands of years.

We need the courage to call something sinful - sinful, just as we need to call wrongs as wrongs, immorality as immorality.

>>> COMMENT UNDER ANALYSIS<<<


yeah but now obama can legally marry reggie love.

>>> END COMMENT <<<
